item.title: NYCB
item.description: score:20 Chances: NYCB is facing turmoil after discovering material weaknesses in tracking loan risks and reporting a tenfold increase in fourth-quarter loss. The bank’s stock price plummeted by as much as 20% in after-hours trading after the announcement of the internal control weaknesses and CEO replacement.
